title: Watch: A Monkey Gave This UP Cop A Free Grooming Session & He Sat There Like It Was No Big Deal
text:
Watch: A Monkey Gave This UP Cop A Free Grooming Session & He Sat There Like It Was No Big Deal

Watch: A Monkey Gave This UP Cop A Free Grooming Session & He Sat There Like It Was No Big Deal

When it comes to mischief, monkeys definitely rule the roost, from stealing stuff to barging into laces unannounced, they do the weirdest things.

But can you keep your calm with an monkey the way this UP police does?

Twitter

In a video that's going viral, a UP cop is seen rummaging through paperwork with a Monkey sitting on his head and picking out lice.

The cop can be head saying 'it's time I have to go' to the monkey, while the rest present at the station are in splits.

One man suggests the cop to lure it with a banana and drive it away, but he chooses to sit till the monkey is finished with its free grooming session.

"The monkey came inside the station premises in the afternoon and bit one of the woman officers. After that, he sat on my desk and as I tried to move, attacked me too. He later ensconced on my chair and began flipping through my hair," Srikanth Dwivedi, the Station House Officer (SHO) was quoted in a news report by ANI.

Here's how people reacted to the viral video:

He said the monkey roamed around the station till midnight. "In the morning, he was released in the nearby forest area," he added.

The experience of these police officers in Pilibhit suggests that if you do not want to be disturbed while you are at work... use Reetha, Shikhakai or some other good shampoo," he wrote.]

The 53-second video was shared by Rahul Srivastav, Additional SP, Uttar Pradesh Police and has been viewed thousands of times already
